Plot: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.
Title: Erin Brockovich
Actors: Julia Roberts, David Brisbin, Dawn Didawick, Albert Finney
tomatoConsensus: Taking full advantage of Julia Roberts's considerable talent and appeal, Erin Brockovich overcomes a few character and plot issues to deliver a smart, thoughtful, and funny legal drama.
